name: homunculus (humanplane)
description: [项目级] A Claude Code plugin that watches how you work, learns your patterns, and evolves itself to help you better.。来源: https://github.com/humanplane/homunculus

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A Claude Code plugin that watches how you work, learns your patterns, and evolves itself to help you better.

来源: https://github.com/humanplane/homunculus
语言: Shell
Stars: 265

name: homunculus/landing 模块
description: [模块级] homunculus 项目的 landing 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/humanplane/homunculus

genes.title: landing 模块说明
genes.content:
There's a landing page in `/landing` (React + Tailwind). Run it:

```bash
cd landing && npm install && npm run dev
```

---

MIT License

---

*A small thing, growing toward the light.*
